## aads negatives campaign-create

Create campaign-level negative keywords

```
aads negatives campaign-create [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --campaign-id int     Campaign ID
      --from-json string    JSON input
  -h, --help                help for campaign-create
      --match-type string   BROAD or EXACT (default "EXACT")
      --text string         Negative keyword text
```
